title: 일본지부 11주년 행사 허브
content:
[[include info:start-standalone]]
+* 11周年イベント・ハブ
**원작:** http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/11thannivpages
**저자:** SCP-JP 행사위원회
**역자:** [[*user salamander724]]
[[include info:end-standalone]]

[[include :scp-jp:component:jstyles]]
[[module css]]

.contest{
   font-weight: bold;
   font-size: 180%;
   padding-top: 40px;
   padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.presenter{
   font-size: 120%;
}

#page-content p {
    line-height: 2;
}

[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[=image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file:3438721-317-r2lf/11th_banner.svg]]
[[size 250%]]##midnightblue|**공식 경연 ＆ 캠페인**##[[/size]]

**//SHOGUN은 그쪽을 보고 있어라//**

**04/29 - 06/30**
